English:
Aren't you scared of the curse? What a curious
fellow you are.
Chinese:
唉啊，居然不怕詛咒追過來了，
好奇心真重呢。
Korean:
어머, 저주에 겁먹지 않고 쫓아오다니
참 별나네
German:
Hast du keine Angst vor dem Fluch? Du bist ja
seltsam.

English:
That's correct. I'm the black cat that everyone's
talking about.
Chinese:
沒錯，你說的對。
我正是傳言中的黑貓。
Korean:
응, 맞아.
내가 바로 소문의 고양이의 정체야
German:
Genau. Ich bin die schwarze Katze, von der alle
reden.

English: You want to know why I'm claiming to curse people?
Chinese: 你問我為什麼要說詛咒這麼嚇人的話嗎？
Korean: 어째서 저주 같은 불길한 소리를 했냐고?
German:
Du möchtest wissen, warum ich behaupte, Leute
zu verfluchen?

English:
It's their own fault. Every time someone sees me,
they start talking about bad luck and act all
scared.
Chinese:
這都是他們不好。誰叫每個人看到我，
都喊著「不幸的象徵」，害怕的躲著我。
Korean:
그쪽이 나쁜 거야. 이놈이고 저놈이고, 나를 보면
「불행의 상징」이라면서 겁을 먹는걸
German:
Daran sind sie selbst schuld. Immer, wenn jemand
mich sieht, redet die Person von Pech und
bekommt es mit der Angst zu tun.

English:
I'm so beautiful, yet they make such outrageous
assumptions. It's absolutely disgraceful.
Chinese:
我明明就這麼的美麗，
貼上這莫名奇妙的標籤，你不覺得很過份嗎？
Korean:
이렇게 아름다운데
그렇게 불합리하게 단정 짓다니, 너무하지 않아?
German:
Ich bin so schön und trotzdem wird mir so etwas
unterstellt. Es ist einfach unerhört.

English:
So I decided to pretend I really could bring bad
luck, and give everyone a fright.
Chinese:
所以我乾脆真的讓他們不幸，
才這樣嚇他們的。
Korean:
그래서 이렇게 된 거 정말 불행하게 만들어주려고
놀래킨 거야
German:
Also beschloss ich so zu tun, als ob ich wirklich
Pech bringe, um allen Angst zu machen.

English:
It was the humans who started making a fuss about
curses and whatnot. They're such unusual
creatures.
Chinese:
結果人們自己在那傳什麼會被詛咒的謠言，
反而好笑到不行啊。
Korean:
그랬더니 인간들이
멋대로 저주니 뭐니 소란을 피우니까
오히려 이상해서
German:
Es waren die Menschen, die angefangen haben, von
Flüchen und so zu reden. Sie sind sehr
ungewöhnliche Wesen.

English: How could a curse possibly exist in cyberspace?
Chinese:
在這電腦世界裡說什麼詛咒，
怎麼可能會有那種事情。
Korean:
이런 전뇌세계에서 저주라니 바보 같아.
그런 게 있을 리 없잖아
German: Wie soll es im Cyberspace einen Fluch geben?

English:
I won't let some human tell me what to do. If you
want to stop me, you'll have to do it by force.
Chinese:
我才不要聽人類說教，
想阻止我的話你可以用實力阻止啊。
Korean:
인간의 설교 따윈 들을 생각 없어.
말리고 싶으면 힘으로 막으면 되잖아
German:
Ich lasse mir von keinem Menschen vorschreiben,
was ich tun soll. Wenn du mich aufhalten
willst, musst du mich überzeugen.
